description: > MEDIUM CONFIDENCE! | > CORRECT NAME OF TOOL COULD ALSO BE 'Knot_pull' | Knot_pull-python package for biopolymer smoothing and knot detection | Python module for knot-like structure detection in biological molecules | KnotPull - a simplifier for 3D structures | KnotPull reduces a user provided 3D structure, to simplify it, while preserving the topology of the chain. It has been successfully used for knot detection in proteins and chromatin chains
name: IMPLEMENTATION:Knot_pull
